full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENG GE'I GDONG PA CAN GYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(ZHES YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENG GE'I GDONG CAN GYI BZLOG BSGYUR DGRA BGEGS BZLOG BYED BYA BA 'DI NI MCHOD DPON PA BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS BSKUL BA DANG RANG RANG BSKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA 'BYUNG DAM SNYAM PAS BSAM PAS BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN RTEN NAS BGYIS 'DI NON PA'I TSOGS CI MCHIS PA THAMS CAD BLA MA MKHA' 'GRO'I TSOGS LA CHAGS SO, ,BZOD PAR GSOL, ,CUNG ZAD DGE BA'I BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN MI MTHUN PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
